General.Name: Connexus Corp
General.Description: Connexus Corporation focuses on providing bitcoin solutions to consumer in the United States. It owns seven bitcoin automated teller machines. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Bethel, Connecticut.
General.Address: 211 Greenwood Avenue, Bethel, CT, United States, 06801
